00001 /* host.h - host-dependent definitions and interfaces */

00051 #ifndef HOST_H
00052 #define HOST_H
00053 
00054 /* make sure host compiler supports ANSI-C */
00055 #ifndef __STDC__ /* an ansi C compiler is required */
00056 #error The SimpleScalar simulators must be compiled with an ANSI C compiler.
00057 #endif /* __STDC__ */
00058 
00059 /* enable inlining here, if supported by host compiler */
00060 #undef INLINE
00061 #if defined(__GNUC__)
00062 #define INLINE          inline
00063 #else
00064 #define INLINE
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 /* bind together two symbols, at preprocess time */
00068 #ifdef __GNUC__
00069 /* this works on all GNU GCC targets (that I've seen...) */
00070 #ifndef SYMCAT
00071 #define SYMCAT(X,Y)     X##Y
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 #define ANSI_SYMCAT
00075 #else /* !__GNUC__ */
00076 #ifdef OLD_SYMCAT
00077 
00078 #ifndef SYMCAT
00079 #define SYMCAT(X,Y)     XY
00080 #endif
00081 
00082 #else /* !OLD_SYMCAT */
00083 #ifndef SYMCAT
00084 #define SYMCAT(X,Y)     X##Y
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 #define ANSI_SYMCAT
00088 #endif /* OLD_SYMCAT */
00089 #endif /* __GNUC__ */
00090 
00091 /* host-dependent canonical type definitions */
00092 typedef int bool_t;                     /* generic boolean type */
00093 typedef unsigned char byte_t;           /* byte - 8 bits */
00094 typedef signed char sbyte_t;
00095 typedef unsigned short word_t;          /* word - 16 bits */
00096 typedef signed short sword_t;
00097 typedef unsigned int dword_t;           /* double word - 32 bits */
00098 typedef signed int sdword_t;
00099 typedef float sfloat_t;                 /* single-precision float - 32 bits */
00100 typedef double dfloat_t;                /* double-precision float - 64 bits */
00101 typedef long double efloat_t;           /* extended-precision float - varies */
00102 
00103 /* qword defs, note: not all targets support qword types */
00104 #if defined(__GNUC__) || defined(__SUNPRO_C) || defined(__CC_C89) || defined(__CC_XLC)
00105 #define HOST_HAS_QWORD
00106 typedef unsigned long long qword_t;     /* qword - 64 bits */
00107 typedef signed long long sqword_t;
00108 #ifdef ANSI_SYMCAT
00109 #define ULL(N)          N##ULL          /* qword_t constant */
00110 #define LL(N)           N##LL           /* sqword_t constant */
00111 #else /* OLD_SYMCAT */
00112 #define ULL(N)          NULL    /* qword_t constant */
00113 #define LL(N)           NLL             /* sqword_t constant */
00114 #endif
00115 #elif defined(__alpha)
00116 #define HOST_HAS_QWORD
00117 typedef unsigned long qword_t;          /* qword - 64 bits */
00118 typedef signed long sqword_t;
00119 #ifdef ANSI_SYMCAT
00120 #define ULL(N)          N##UL           /* qword_t constant */
00121 #define LL(N)           N##L            /* sqword_t constant */
00122 #else /* OLD_SYMCAT */
00123 #define ULL(N)          NUL             /* qword_t constant */
00124 #define LL(N)           NL              /* sqword_t constant */
00125 #endif
00126 #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
00127 #define HOST_HAS_QWORD
00128 typedef unsigned __int64 qword_t;       /* qword - 64 bits */
00129 typedef signed __int64 sqword_t;
00130 #define ULL(N)          ((qword_t)(N))
00131 #define LL(N)           ((sqword_t)(N))
00132 #else /* !__GNUC__ && !__alpha */
00133 #undef HOST_HAS_QWORD
00134 #endif
00135 
00136 /* statistical counter types, use largest counter type available */
00137 #ifdef HOST_HAS_QWORD
00138 typedef sqword_t counter_t;
00139 typedef sqword_t tick_t;                /* NOTE: unsigned breaks caches */
00140 #define TICK_T_MAX  ((tick_t)(9223372036854775807ULL))
00141 #else /* !HOST_HAS_QWORD */
00142 typedef dfloat_t counter_t;
00143 typedef dfloat_t tick_t;
00144 #define TICK_T_MAX  DBL_MAX
00145 #endif /* HOST_HAS_QWORD */
00146 
00147 #ifdef __svr4__
00148 #define setjmp  _setjmp
00149 #define longjmp _longjmp
00150 #endif
00151 
00152 #endif /* HOST_H */
